cloud_connect_datacenter_add_routing_err: An error has occurred adding the routing configuration: {{message}}
cloud_connect_datacenter_add_routing_suc: Adding routing configuration. Click here to view its status.
cloud_connect_datacenter_add_routing_bgp: Neighbour IP address, BGP of your router in the DC. This address must be part of the subnetwork configured in the “DC configuration” section
cloud_connect_datacenter_add_routing_ip_: IPv4 address belonging to the DC.
cloud_connect_datacenter_add_routing_asn: Positive non null number outside of 65501
Your AS BGP number, which is configured on your router situated in the DC.
cloud_connect_datacenter_add_routing_typ: The router configuration can only be one type
